title: Portland Cookie Store Project
description:
This project was based around the concept of a franchise of cookie stores within the Portland, OR area.

The core functions used in this project were a table and form. The table was used to display the individual store and sales information.

A form was created to able to add a new store and its data to the table.

title: Bcykleta Bicycle Store - 201 Final Project
description:
This was the final project of my Code Fellows 201 course.

The primary concept was a Portland bicycle shop that would take donated bikes and sell them.

The site would be able to take information about donated bikes and display it.

Additionally, the site would also have the functionality to take information for people who wanted to volunteer for the shop and display their information and volunteer schedule.

title: Busmall Product Analysis Application
description:
This was an app designed to show a user 3 different products which they could vote on.

After voting, the user would be shown three new products, different from the last three.

After voting 15 times the user is shown their total votes for selected products.

Gotta be honest, there is a couple thing on this project I am not entirely sure what is going on... in short, not my finest work.
